name: Neon Star
description:
Neon Star is a classic puzzle game with new upgrade in 2021.
Invite friends to play & win rewards.
Enjoy the game, challenge levels to win massive diamonds everyday!

Download & install for free, play Neon Star now!

Popstar Game features:

The more star you pop at one time, the more score you will get!
Lottery scratches, lucky slots, more lucky games!

Bomb: Blow up 3X3 stars;
Brush: Change the star color;
Reset: Randomly swap all star positions;

Popstar Tips:

a. Daily check-in, get 10000+ diamonds per month.
b. Get 1000 diamonds from every successful friend invitation.
c. Get 20% extra diamonds of your friends’ earnings free.
d. Free diamonds in each levels.
e. Have chance to win 999 diamonds after level clear.


Neon Star is a classic puzzle game!
Play & win diamonds here for free everyday!
Please share this good game with your friends,
and invite friends to get more rewards!
